name: Sky Jump
description:
The main character, Jamho, glimpses the tremendous sight
in the sky in his dream.
He is fascinated by the unknown curiosity of the sight
and makes plans.
I saved money to buy a light aircraft, and the area
where I often see square cubes.
Exploring. Then, find a map hidden in the sky
and do something beyond it.
To find it, he starts to climb shouting "Jump" and "Jump Jump."
What did you see to make this powerful jump?
Let's be a player and follow the journey.
[Jump your body using a left controller trigger.
Jump one step at a time and arrive at your destination.]
